preset_modes: more  than 25 preset modes (e.g. soft skin, fireworks, close-up)
ISO: up to 6400 ISO with little noise

color: purple, blue, pink, silver, white, black, or red
settings: manual control and various automatic settings (video modeburst shooting, etc.)
long_exposure: up to 60 minutes with bulb mode

effects: 21 creative mode settings (small face, soft focus, miniature, etc.)
